meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Mike Myers John Krahulec Alec Iorio Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #942.

td.p: Mike Myers, a director of marketing originally from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
John Krahulec, a computer consultant originally from Buffalo, New York
Alec Iorio, an international freight forwarder originally from St. Louis, Missouri (whose 2-day cash winnings total $10,800)

tr.td: TV STARS
DELAWARE
GAMES
FRENCH FOOD TERMS
COLLEGES
FINAL RESTING PLACES

toggle('clue_DJ_2_1', 'clue_DJ_2_1_stuck', '(Mike: What is the Soviet Union?)
(Alec: What is France?)
[time\'s up, John signals in]
(John: What is the [*]?)
(Alex: This was the time to go, not fast enough, John, this was the time to go for the obvious, what is the [*], yes.)

United States

AlecMike
Triple Stumper
')

tr.td: Alec
John
Mike
(lock game)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '[after revealing John\'s response]
(Alex: You remembered, that\'s when we went to 25-cent [*]s and Dr. White\'s picture was on one of them.)

[NOTE: Dr. White was honored on a 3-cent stamp issued to be used with the old 22-cent First Class stamps.]
JohnWhat is a stamp
$698
MikeWhat is ?
$1,400
AlecWhat is TV?
$1,300
A stamp')

tr.td: In April the late Dr. Paul D. White became familiar to many people who saw his portrait on this
Alec
John
Mike
3-day champion: $13,700
2nd place: Emerson video camcorder & Easy-Rest recliner and sofa bed + either the Jeopardy! box game or the Jeopardy! Challenger
3rd place: Greif Companies his-and-her tailored clothing + either the Jeopardy! box game or the Jeopardy! Challenger
Alec
John
Mike

(including 1 DD),
